Description: White glazed composition kohl-tube bearing the names of Tutankhamun and Ankhesenamun.
Curator's comments: Published: H. R. Hall, 'Objects of Tutankhamun in the British Museum', JEA 14 (1928), 74-7.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2011 10 Feb - 10 June, Coventry, Herbert Museum, Secret Egypt 2011 10 June - 24th Oct Torquay Museum, Secret Egypt
